name: Its Alive
description:
A short gothic puzzle platformer

After a terrible accident in the lab your beloved Lenore has been transformed into a zombie, but love is forever so keep her alive and help her navigate through the castle until you can find a cure.

Controls - WASD or Cursor Arrows or GamePad - left click/SPACE/CTRL to jump E/ALT/Right click to Pickup or Drop. Get Your beloved to the Exit and then yourself without her dying.
